languages.text: "Места, затронутые Хаосом, надлежит предавать огню и оставлять в забвении. Кьяву Гамма стоило разбомбить до самого основания и объявить запретным миром. Но вы рассудили иначе и восстановили работу колонии. И даже не потрудились скрыть следы допущенного вашей династией небрежения. Ведь именно фон Валанциус предоставили Кубису Дельфиму столько свободы, что он впал в отступническую ересь. Чем вы руководствовались?"

traits.locale_text: "Подозреваю, очищение и переосвящение целой колонии было затратным мероприятием, но вы все же пошли на него. Приятно видеть, что поиск выгоды для вас менее значим, чем поиск чистоты".

languages.text: "Places touched by Chaos must be purged with fire and condemned to oblivion. Kiava Gamma should have been bombed to dust and pronounced a forbidden world. However, you decided otherwise and restored the colony's operation. And you didn't even go to the trouble of hiding the traces of the neglect committed by your dynasty. After all, it was House von Valancius that gave Cubis Delphim so much freedom that he sank into seditious heresy. What was your rationale?"
languages.original_text: "Места, затронутые Хаосом, надлежит предавать огню и оставлять в забвении. Кьяву Гамма стоило разбомбить до самого основания и объявить запретным миром. Но вы рассудили иначе и восстановили работу колонии. И даже не потрудились скрыть следы допущенного вашей династией небрежения. Ведь именно фон Валанциус предоставили Кубису Дельфиму столько свободы, что он впал в отступническую ересь. Чем вы руководствовались?"

After all, it was House von Valancius that gave Cubis Delphim so much freedom that he sank into seditious heresy. What was your rationale?"

languages.text: 「渾沌に触れられた場所は炎で浄化し、忘れ去らなくてはならない。キアヴァ・ガンマは爆破により塵となり、禁断の星と宣告を受けるべきだったのだ。しかしお前はそうしないと決め、コロニーの運転を再開した。しかも王朝で行われていた怠慢の痕跡を隠すことすらしなかった。ついにはフォン・ヴァランシウス家は、その身を異端に扇動されるがまま堕ちたキュビス・デルフィムに、多大なる自由を与えた。これらに対する論理的根拠を聞こうじゃないか」
languages.original_text: "Places touched by Chaos must be purged with fire and condemned to oblivion. Kiava Gamma should have been bombed to dust and pronounced a forbidden world. However, you decided otherwise and restored the colony's operation. And you didn't even go to the trouble of hiding the traces of the neglect committed by your dynasty. After all, it was House von Valancius that gave Cubis Delphim so much freedom that he sank into seditious heresy. What was your rationale?"

traits.locale_text: 「渾沌に触れられた場所は炎で浄化し、忘れ去らなくてはならない。キアヴァ・ガンマは爆破により塵となり、禁断の星と宣告を受けるべきだったのだ。しかしお前はそうしないと決め、コロニーの運転を再開した。しかも王朝で行われていた怠慢の痕跡を隠すことすらしなかった。ついにはフォン・ヴァランシウス家は、その身を異端に扇動されるがまま堕ちたキュビス・デルフィムに、多大なる自由を与えた。これらに対する論理的根拠を聞こうじゃないか」

languages.original_text: "Places touched by Chaos must be purged with fire and condemned to oblivion. Kiava Gamma should have been bombed to dust and pronounced a forbidden world. However, you decided otherwise and restored the colony's operation. And you didn't even go to the trouble of hiding the traces of the neglect committed by your dynasty. After all, it was House von Valancius that gave Cubis Delphim so much freedom that he sank into seditious heresy. What was your rationale?"

languages.text: “但凡混沌污染之地，都必须在烈焰中净化，直至湮灭。基亚瓦伽马星本该在爆炸中灰飞烟灭，从此成为禁止踏足的世界。然而，你却选择让殖民地恢复运作，甚至懒得去粉饰因你的王朝玩忽职守而造成的灾难旧迹。毕竟，正是因为冯·瓦兰修斯家族对库比斯·德尔菲姆如此放任自流，他才会沦为狂热的异端分子。你对此有何解释？”
languages.original_text: "Places touched by Chaos must be purged with fire and condemned to oblivion. Kiava Gamma should have been bombed to dust and pronounced a forbidden world. However, you decided otherwise and restored the colony's operation. And you didn't even go to the trouble of hiding the traces of the neglect committed by your dynasty. After all, it was House von Valancius that gave Cubis Delphim so much freedom that he sank into seditious heresy. What was your rationale?"

traits.locale_text: “但凡混沌污染之地，都必须在烈焰中净化，直至湮灭。基亚瓦伽马星本该在爆炸中灰飞烟灭，从此成为禁止踏足的世界。然而，你却选择让殖民地恢复运作，甚至懒得去粉饰因你的王朝玩忽职守而造成的灾难旧迹。毕竟，正是因为冯·瓦兰修斯家族对库比斯·德尔菲姆如此放任自流，他才会沦为狂热的异端分子。你对此有何解释？”

languages.text: «Los lugares tocados por el Caos deben ser purgados con fuego y aniquilados por completo. Kiava Gamma debería haber sido bombardeado hasta no dejar piedra sobre piedra y declarado mundo prohibido. Sin embargo, decidió restablecer el funcionamiento de la colonia en vez de ello. Ni siquiera se molestó en ocultar la negligencia de su dinastía. A fin de cuentas, fue la casa von Valancius la que dio a Cubis Delphim la libertad suficiente como para que se sumiera en la herejía y la sedición. ¿Qué le motivó?».
languages.original_text: "Places touched by Chaos must be purged with fire and condemned to oblivion. Kiava Gamma should have been bombed to dust and pronounced a forbidden world. However, you decided otherwise and restored the colony's operation. And you didn't even go to the trouble of hiding the traces of the neglect committed by your dynasty. After all, it was House von Valancius that gave Cubis Delphim so much freedom that he sank into seditious heresy. What was your rationale?"

traits.locale_text: «Los lugares tocados por el Caos deben ser purgados con fuego y aniquilados por completo. Kiava Gamma debería haber sido bombardeado hasta no dejar piedra sobre piedra y declarado mundo prohibido. Sin embargo, decidió restablecer el funcionamiento de la colonia en vez de ello. Ni siquiera se molestó en ocultar la negligencia de su dinastía. A fin de cuentas, fue la casa von Valancius la que dio a Cubis Delphim la libertad suficiente como para que se sumiera en la herejía y la sedición. ¿Qué le motivó?».

languages.text: « Tout lieu que le Chaos a touché doit être purgé par le feu et condamné à l'oubli. Kiava Gamma aurait dû être réduite en poussière et déclarée monde interdit. Vous en avez néanmoins décidé autrement, et j'ai ouï dire que la colonie était de nouveau opérationnelle. Vous n'avez même pas pris la peine de dissimuler les traces de la négligence commise par votre dynastie, mais je n'oublie pas que c'est la maison von Valancius qui a donné à Cubis Delphim la liberté de sombrer dans l'hérésie et la sédition. Quel était votre raisonnement ? »
languages.original_text: "Places touched by Chaos must be purged with fire and condemned to oblivion. Kiava Gamma should have been bombed to dust and pronounced a forbidden world. However, you decided otherwise and restored the colony's operation. And you didn't even go to the trouble of hiding the traces of the neglect committed by your dynasty. After all, it was House von Valancius that gave Cubis Delphim so much freedom that he sank into seditious heresy. What was your rationale?"

traits.locale_text: « Tout lieu que le Chaos a touché doit être purgé par le feu et condamné à l'oubli. Kiava Gamma aurait dû être réduite en poussière et déclarée monde interdit. Vous en avez néanmoins décidé autrement, et j'ai ouï dire que la colonie était de nouveau opérationnelle. Vous n'avez même pas pris la peine de dissimuler les traces de la négligence commise par votre dynastie, mais je n'oublie pas que c'est la maison von Valancius qui a donné à Cubis Delphim la liberté de sombrer dans l'hérésie et la sédition. Quel était votre raisonnement ? »

languages.text: "Vom Chaos berührte Orte müssen mit Feuer gereinigt und zur Vergessenheit verdammt werden. Kiava Gamma hätte zu Staub zerbombt und zur verbotenen Welt erklärt werden müssen. Ihr habt jedoch anders entschieden und den Betrieb der Kolonie wiederhergestellt. Und Ihr habt Euch nicht einmal die Mühe gemacht, die Spuren der Nachlässigkeit Eurer Dynastie zu beseitigen. Schließlich war es das Haus von Valancius, das Cubis Delphim so viel Freiheit gegeben hat, dass er in umstürzlerischer Ketzerei versank. Was habt Ihr Euch dabei gedacht?"
languages.original_text: "Places touched by Chaos must be purged with fire and condemned to oblivion. Kiava Gamma should have been bombed to dust and pronounced a forbidden world. However, you decided otherwise and restored the colony's operation. And you didn't even go to the trouble of hiding the traces of the neglect committed by your dynasty. After all, it was House von Valancius that gave Cubis Delphim so much freedom that he sank into seditious heresy. What was your rationale?"

traits.locale_text: "Vom Chaos berührte Orte müssen mit Feuer gereinigt und zur Vergessenheit verdammt werden. Kiava Gamma hätte zu Staub zerbombt und zur verbotenen Welt erklärt werden müssen. Ihr habt jedoch anders entschieden und den Betrieb der Kolonie wiederhergestellt. Und Ihr habt Euch nicht einmal die Mühe gemacht, die Spuren der Nachlässigkeit Eurer Dynastie zu beseitigen. Schließlich war es das Haus von Valancius, das Cubis Delphim so viel Freiheit gegeben hat, dass er in umstürzlerischer Ketzerei versank. Was habt Ihr Euch dabei gedacht?"

languages.text: "Kaos'un elinin dokunduğu yerler ateşle arındırılmalı ve yok olmaya mahkûm edilmelidir. Kiava Gama, bombardımana tutulup tuzla buz edilmeli ve yasaklı dünya ilan edilmeliydi ancak sen aksi yönde karar vererek koloniyi yeniden işler hâle getirdin, hatta hanedanlığının ihmalkârlığına dair izleri gizleme gereği bile duymadın. Nihayetinde Cubis Delphim'e bu kadar özgürlük veren ve onu asi bir kâfire dönüştüren, von Valancius Hanesi'ydi. Bunu nasıl bir mantığa dayanarak yaptın?"
languages.original_text: "Places touched by Chaos must be purged with fire and condemned to oblivion. Kiava Gamma should have been bombed to dust and pronounced a forbidden world. However, you decided otherwise and restored the colony's operation. And you didn't even go to the trouble of hiding the traces of the neglect committed by your dynasty. After all, it was House von Valancius that gave Cubis Delphim so much freedom that he sank into seditious heresy. What was your rationale?"

traits.locale_text: "Kaos'un elinin dokunduğu yerler ateşle arındırılmalı ve yok olmaya mahkûm edilmelidir. Kiava Gama bombardımana tutulup tuzla buz edilmeli ve yasaklı bir dünya ilan edilmeliydi ancak sen aksi yönde karar vererek koloniyi yeniden işler hâle getirdin, hatta hanedanlıığının ihmalkârlığına dair izleri gizleme gereği bile duymadın. Nihayetinde Cubis Delphim'e bu kadar özgürlük veren ve onu asi bir kâfire dönüştüren von Valancius Hanesi'ydi. Bunu nasıl bir mantığa dayanarak yaptın?"
